behaviors.title: All SQLite adapter methods use spawn_blocking for rusqlite calls
Multi-tenant tables keyed by orchestrator_id for isolation
Intent enqueue uses INSERT OR IGNORE for idempotency
Intent dequeue ordered by (created_at_ns ASC, intent_key ASC) for FIFO
mark_retryable sets created_at_ns = now to move intent to back of queue
resolve_in_doubt returns Deny with reason (fail-closed on ambiguity)
Enqueue and dequeue batches bounded by MAX_ENQUEUE_BATCH and MAX_DEQUEUE_BATCH
Legacy migration is idempotent and only copies when target is empty
Legacy effect journal migration treats started/unknown as unknown (fail-closed)
